text: Ẹ̀yin ènìyàn, ẹ bẹ̀rù Olúwa yín, Ẹni tí Ó ṣẹ̀dá yín láti ara ẹ̀mí ẹyọ kan (ìyẹn, Ànábì Ādam). Ó sì ṣẹ̀dá aya rẹ̀ (Hawā’) láti ara rẹ̀. Ó fọ́n ọ̀pọ̀lọ́pọ̀ ọkùnrin àti obìnrin jáde láti ara àwọn méjèèjì. Kí ẹ sì bẹ̀rù Allāhu, Ẹni tí ẹ̀ ń fi bẹ ara yín. (Ẹ ṣọ́) okùn-ìbí. Dájúdájú Allāhu ń jẹ́ Olùṣọ́ lórí yín
